title: Workshops
text: Workshops using the Bioconductor Carpentries training material. See this page for Bioconductor Carpentries Instructors.

title: Instructors
text:
Map and table showing people in the Bioconductor community who are certified Carpentries instructors or in the process of obtaining certification, such as those in the Bioconductor Carpentries training program.
